subsection.name: Who are we?
subsection.p:
Synodex launched in the UK in January 2011. We operate nationally with our UK Head Office based in London. In March 2011, Innodata purchased Synodex and has invested in Synodex technology and operations. We now use the latest workflow technology combined with high security and Innodata's operational expertise. Innodata is ISO 9001/27001 compliant.
